name: Plushie Royale
description:
"You may bring one toy. Just one."

It's time to find out who little Janine loves best...
in a stich-tearing, stuffing-spilling PLUSH TOY DEATHMATCH.

Four toys enter. One toy leaves.

Credits:

Elie Abraham
Veera Hokkanen
Laura K. Horton
Antti Karkinen
Helena Sorva
Juuso Toikka
